åŸç”Ÿæ–¹å¼ or jquery

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <title>Document</title>
  </head>

  <body>
    <select name="tech" id="selector"></select>
    <!-- jquery -->
    <!-- <script src="./jquery1.11.2.min.js"></script> -->
    <!-- <script src="https://cdn.bootcdn.net/ajax/libs/jquery/1.11.2/jquery.js"></script> -->

    <script>
      // 1. æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ•°æ®
      var data = [
        { id: 0, text: "H5" },
        { id: 1, text: "JS" },
        { id: 2, text: "JAVA" },
        { id: 3, text: "Vue", remark: "è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªremark" },
        { id: 4, text: "React" },
      ];
      // 2. æ‹¼æ¥remarkå¤„ç†å‡½æ•°
      function pinRemark(item) {
        return item.remark ? "(" + item.remark + ")" : "";
      }
      // 3. åŠ¨æ€ç”Ÿæˆ options
      for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
        var option = document.createElement("option");
        var item = data[i];
        option.value = item.id;
        // 4. åŠ¨æ€æ‹¼æ¥remark
        option.innerHTML = /*ä¹‹å‰çš„optionå±•ç¤ºçš„å†…å®¹*/ item.text + /*æ‹¼æ¥çš„remark*/ pinRemark(item);
        // 5. åˆ¤æ–­æœ‰remarkï¼Œæ·»åŠ disabledå±æ€§
        if (item.remark) {
          option.disabled = true;
        }
        // 6. æŒ‚è½½èŠ‚ç‚¹
        // $('#selector').append(option); // jquery
        document.getElementById("selector").append(option);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

jquery + select2

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <title>Document</title>
    <!-- <link rel="stylesheet" href="./dist/css/select2.css" /> -->
    <link href="https://cdn.bootcdn.net/ajax/libs/select2/4.0.13/css/select2.css" rel="stylesheet" />
    <style>
      .js-example-data-array {
        width: 200px;
      }
    </style>
  </head>

  <body>
    <select class="js-example-data-array"></select>

    <!-- <script src="./jquery1.11.2.min.js"></script> -->
    <script src="https://cdn.bootcdn.net/ajax/libs/jquery/1.11.2/jquery.js"></script>
    <!-- <script src="./dist/js/select2.full.js"></script> -->
    <script src="https://cdn.bootcdn.net/ajax/libs/select2/4.0.13/js/select2.full.js"></script>
    <script>
      // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ•°æ®
      var data = [
        { id: 0, text: "H5" },
        { id: 1, text: "JS" },
        { id: 2, text: "JAVA" },
        { id: 3, text: "Vue", remark: "è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªremark" },
        { id: 4, text: "React" },
      ];
      //  æ•´ç†åçš„æ–°æ•°æ®
      var list = [];

      for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
        var element = data[i];
        // æœ‰remarkçš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œå¢åŠ disabledå±æ€§ï¼Œå¹¶å¯¹textè¿›è¡Œæ•´ç†
        if (element.remark) {
          list.push({
            id: element.id,
            disabled: true,
            text: element.text + "(" + element.remark + ")",
          });
        } else {
          list.push(element);
        }
      }
      // åˆå§‹åŒ–select2æ•°æ®
      $(".js-example-data-array").select2({
        data: list,
      });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

jquery + select2 è¿›è¡ŒæŠ½å–æ–¹æ³•

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <title>Document</title>
    <!-- <link rel="stylesheet" href="./dist/css/select2.css" /> -->
    <link href="https://cdn.bootcdn.net/ajax/libs/select2/4.0.13/css/select2.css" rel="stylesheet" />
    <style>
      .js-example-data-array {
        width: 200px;
      }
    </style>
  </head>

  <body>
    <select class="js-example-data-array"></select>

    <!-- <script src="./jquery1.11.2.min.js"></script> -->
    <script src="https://cdn.bootcdn.net/ajax/libs/jquery/1.11.2/jquery.js"></script>
    <!-- <script src="./dist/js/select2.full.js"></script> -->
    <script src="https://cdn.bootcdn.net/ajax/libs/select2/4.0.13/js/select2.full.js"></script>
    <script>
      // æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ•°æ®
      function formatDisabledRemarkDatas(data) {
        var list = [];
        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
          var element = data[i];
          // æœ‰remarkçš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œå¢åŠ disabledå±æ€§ï¼Œå¹¶å¯¹textè¿›è¡Œæ•´ç†
          if (element.remark) {
            list.push({
              id: element.id,
              disabled: true,
              text: element.text + "(" + element.remark + ")",
            });
          } else {
            list.push(element);
          }
        }
        return list;
      }
    </script>
    <script>
      // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ•°æ®
      var data = [
        { id: 0, text: "H5" },
        { id: 1, text: "JS" },
        { id: 2, text: "JAVA" },
        { id: 3, text: "Vue", remark: "è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªremark" },
        { id: 4, text: "React" },
      ];

      // åˆå§‹åŒ–select2æ•°æ®
      $(".js-example-data-array").select2({
        //  æ•´ç†åçš„æ–°æ•°æ®
        data: formatDisabledRemarkDatas(data),
      });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>
